it.polimi.se2018.controller

Class DiceBag

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.controller.DiceBag

  • public class DiceBag
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains all the dices that can be drafted and used. Conceptual representation of a real Bag of Dices. The important difference respecting a "real" Dice Bag is that dices do not actually exist until they are requested.
    Author:
    Federico Haag
    See Also:
    Dice

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DiceBag(int numberOfDicesPerColor)
      Creates a DiceBag containing specified number of dices of all colors (DiceColor)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      void addDice(Dice dice)
      Adds the specified Dice to this DiceBag
      java.util.List<Dice> getDices(int quantity)
      Gets the specified quantity of dices from the DiceBag if there are enough availables.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DiceBag

        public DiceBag(int numberOfDicesPerColor)
        Creates a DiceBag containing specified number of dices of all colors (DiceColor)
        Parameters:
        numberOfDicesPerColor - how many dices for each color have to be created
        See Also:
        Dice, DiceColor

    • Method Detail

      • getDices

        public java.util.List<Dice> getDices(int quantity)
        Gets the specified quantity of dices from the DiceBag if there are enough availables. If not, a RuntimeException is thrown
        Parameters:
        quantity - how many dices have to be getted
        Returns:
        a list of dices of length same of param quantity
        See Also:
        Dice

      • addDice

        public void addDice(Dice dice)
        Adds the specified Dice to this DiceBag
        Parameters:
        dice - the dice to be added to
